short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aura is a Chrome extension which is be used to beautify your home page and make it your own

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser's homepage with Aura, the ultimate customization extension. Aura lets you personalize your homepage experience by allowing you to customize the UI, including clock styles, colors, and much more. Make your homepage truly yours with the ability to add a variety of widgets to the home screen.
